Terms:

2) Please write my name correctly! Check twice!
3) Don't open a trade if you don't manage to pay within a few hours.
4) Online Payment/Credit Card Payment NOT accepted. ONLY in Moneygram branch with Cash!

If you want to discuss the trade before opening it, you can chat me in WhatsApp +79226045222.

Your Bitcoins will be released once payment has been confirmed.

Buyer assumes western fee's

Do not open a trade unless you are able to send within a hour

▪We speak english and spanish too.

YOU CAN TRANSFER FUNDS AND ONCE WE RECEIVE WE WILL RELEASE BITCOIN

Purchase bitcoins with cash-by-mail.

First time buyers welcome! We answer questions to help you.
We reply to messages 8am-11pm (MDT).

****To purchase with a cashier's check instead, visit this ad: localbitcoins.com/ad/557215

****Please ignore trade volume limits;
just contact us to ask for larger trades.****

We do NOT require your ID for any purpose whatsoever. But we will expect you to communicate, so we know you aren't a fake buyer wasting our time. If you don't communicate, we won't be able to trade.
Open a trade, initiate conversation, and respond to our questions. We will post shipping instructions once we verify you're a serious trader who will follow the terms of trade. Below are tips and instructions for preparing your shipment.

We accept cash sent in the mail for purchasing bitcoins. Our receiving address is a business location with strict security for handling packages and on-duty personnel to sign for packages. We have to verify our ID with the clerk in order to pick up packages, so no one else can do so.

Our name and address must be written out fully and exactly as provided, or the package may be rejected by our receiving agent. For added security of the delivery, it is recommended that after preparing address label, you should post a picture of it here so we can confirm it is written correctly. After shipping, post tracking number (or picture of it) here so we can track the package en-route, and so we can pick it up and process it without any delay. We want you to get your bitcoins ASAP.

Ship by USPS Priority Mail or better (costs ~$6.65) with tracking. For purchases over $3000, USPS Express Mail is recommended, but not required (costs ~$23.75). Packages should never be sent without tracking (which is included free on Flat Rate Envelopes). Package must be mailed from within the U.S. If interested in buying less than $300 of Bitcoin and want to use cheaper shipping (such as First-Class stamp), just ask for approval when opening trade. In most cases, this is ok. You may split shipment into multiple shipments if you wish to.

We recommend you use the largest bills possible to reduce bulk, and double-wrap the cash inside a second sealed envelope or other sleeve (magazines with edges taped shut, small bubble mailers, etc.). Essentially, you do not want the package to look interesting or valuable to curious eyes during shipping, and you also don't want the cash to spill out if the package becomes damaged during shipping.

The bitcoin price for the trade is locked in place at the time you open trade, and shipment must be postmarked the same day as the trade is opened (unless we expressly give you an exception to this rule). Bitcoins are released from escrow promptly upon receipt of the package and successful verification of the quantity and authenticity of the currency inside. For your protection, we videotape the opening and counting of all packages (videos are kept only for purposes of aiding in any unlikely disputes, and deleted immediately upon release of bitcoins).

If you have any further questions or concerns, text your username to 909-543-9834 to start a conversation. Or contact us through Wickr at fred45. We reply to messages 8am-11pm (MDT).


We have never had a package lost, but in the unlikely event of such, We are not liable for packages lost by the USPS or any other carrier. It is your responsibility to ensure package is properly handled and shipped. Always hand valuable packages directly to a shipping agent, never dropped in a mailbox. Our responsibility for the security of the package begins when it is accepted and signed for by our receiving agents.

Open hours: 7am-8pm (-5 GMT)

Payment informations will be send once the trading is open, please only open a trading is you are able to pay in the next 90 minutes

Please keep in mind:
• Btc will be release if the office is open during the next hour after the money is sent, if the office is close the btc will be send in the first hour when 

after you sent the money thru western union/moneygram please send me the next information:

Name of sender
City sent from
Phone no of sender
Mg ref number/mtcn nmr

Thanks

Sus Bitcoins seran liberados una vez que se haya confirmado el pago.
El pago debe hacerse en 2 horas
El comprador asume la tarifa de envio
Por favor Envie foto de documento de identidad
Por favor envie el soporte de Western Union en imagen
Libero btc rapido
Your Bitcoins will be released once the payment has been confirmed.
Payment must be made in 2 hours
The buyer assumes the shipping fee
Please send photo ID
Please send Western Union support in image
Libero btc fast

Contact hours: 24/7
best times: 9am - 8pm EST

Hello,

Cash in mail is our preferred method of trade. We have been trading this way for over 3 years. Trade in confidence!


READ THE ENTIRE LISTING FOR IMPORTANT DETAILS PERTAINING TO YOUR CASH BY MAIL TRADE! 


After 2 successful trades you will be put on our trusted list to receive higher limits ( up to $9,500 ) 
____________________________

ALL trades must be mailed the same day you make your trade request. A priority mail or overnight express tracking number must be provided and show that it has been scanned and accepted by your USPS facility the same day the trade is initiated. If this is not the case, the trade needs to be canceled. DO NOT mark your trade as paid until a tracking number and initial acceptance scan from post office has been provided. 

We will accept packages shipped via USPS priority or overnight express ONLY. Do not use any other carrier or shipping method.

____________________________


When you are sending cash, do NOT just throw cash in a Priority or Priority Express envelope and send it on its way. Please put it in an envelope first at a minimum. Get creative when you send it, conceal it in a card or an old magazine or go all out with it and use mylar. It is your money. No one wants to lose money. If a package comes open and hundred dollar bills are spilling out...Do you think you're going to see that package again?

WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR LOST PACKAGES! Your package  must be scanned as delivered prior to release of escrow.

____________________________

Here is how it works:

1. Initiate a trade for the amount you are ready to send.

2. Mail your package.  * Senders details will be provided upon request. 

3. Provide the tracking for your package once it has been scanned as accepted at the post office.

4. Mark as paid.

5. We release coins as soon as package is received.

Simple and easy. We look forward to many trades by mail!

____________________________

We film all packages being opened from start to finish. Cash will be checked for counterfeit bills via detection pen and light. The video is only used in the event of a dispute or a damaged package arrives. Serious traders only!

Escrow is released the same day cash is received. We pick up mail, verify ALL orders, then complete trade. It should be no later than 5pm EST the day your cash is received.
____________________________

Thank you

A+Trader

Buy bitcoins using advcash with US Dollar (USD)
Rules:

>>> First, Enter amount of BitCoins You want to create trade.

>>> I`ll send you Advcash [USD] wallet address in chat.

>>> Next, Login in to Your Advcash account and send funds to My Advcash [USD] wallet. (If don't have advcash account get one: https://wallet.advcash.com/register).

>>> Send Me a message that funds was sent or just write "+" and I will release Your BitCoins immediately.

With respect, Elena.

Hi, this is a cash by mail trade for BTC. Simply select the amount you would like and follow instructions. 

PLEASE READ ALL THE INFORMATION BELOW IN ORDER TO UNDERSTAND THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE TRADE.


No Ny residents please read terms, no third parties you must be one purchasing, cash must have been obtained legally and bitcoins will be used as such. 

If you want a larger amount open trade message me I can add funds.


ALL trades must be mailed the same day you make your trade request unless it is the evening in which case you message me and I approve. The package then must send following day priority mail or overnight express mail or overnight FedEx  only. Tracking number must be provided and show that it has been scanned and accepted by your local facility or receipt can be uploaded. 

DO NOT mark your trade as paid until a tracking number and initial acceptance scan from post office. Once it is dropped off at post office or if using fedex must be sent OVERNIGHT ONLY.


All orders must be mailed through USPS Express Mail, Priority Mail or FEDEX OVERNIGHT ONLY. (No other FedEx shipping option, ground, saver, ect..... No UPS or other carriers!!!) It is your responsibility to make sure your package gets delivered and to pay all delivery fees. If package does not show as delivered to address provided by me you are responsible for all losses. I will only be responsible for losses if package shows delivered and you have a photo of the label with postage on package showing correct address.   If you want signature required please let me know when you post tracking but only when it is over 2500.00 

I will process your package within two hours of receiving it. While package is being opened I video tape  the process, count all the currency, and check for counterfeit bills. Provided everything checks out, I release your bitcoin immediately.

If you have any questions, feel free to text (424) 341-3618 or on Wickr: coins4less 

WARNING: Due to New York's BitLicense,   I can not  accept payments from any person that resides, is located, has a place of business, or is conducting business in New York. If you mail the package from NY,  will not be able to release to you and will have to dispute the trade.

Cash must have been obtained legally and bitcoin will only  be used legally.  No 3rd parties must be you purchasing coin.

1. Open the trade
2. I will provide my Wing detail to you
3. You send money from any wing agent or your Wing Card.
4. I will release coin immediately after payment is clear. Usually, it takes only 5mn.
5. Wing transfer fee is on you. I expect to receive in full.

* I'm the first and only "Pro Trader" in Cambodia, you can check my profile. I buy/sell large amount of bitcoins. I'm looking forward to be your long term partner.

*Trade in Cambodia only!

* I prefer not to trade with people from India, Bangladesh and Pakistan. People from these countries are not allowed to open this trade!

If this is not the case, the trade needs to be canceled. DO NOT mark your trade as paid until a tracking number and initial acceptance scan from post office has been provided.

To ensure a smooth and speedy transaction, please review each step in this description BEFORE sending a trade request. By doing so, we hope to provide you with an easy and painless trading experience!  
 
PLEASE IGNORE LBC DOLLAR VOLUME LIMITS AND CONTACT US DIRECTLY AT 502-822-6460 IF YOU WISH TO PURCHASE LARGER AMOUNTS.
 

 
STEP 1: REQUESTING A TRADE:
Send a trade request, reserving your bitcoin in escrow. Text your username and the words “cash by mail” to 502-822-6460. When you do so, I will text the mailing address to that number. 
 
*Will resend a copy of the info via e-mail or on LBC if requested after.
 
STEP 2: SENDING THE MONEY:
 
Include a note with the trade reference number, your username and a return address. Write “for bitcoin purchase” on the note.
 
Select a shipping option with a tracking number, and one requiring me to sign for the package. This allows both parties piece of mind and security to your purchase. I know when your package will arrive, and you know when I have received it.
 
Send the money within 24 hrs of your trade request. If you cannot send the money right away, simply cancel the trade and open a new one when you can.
 
IMPORTANT: 1-2 day delivery is required.
*Sending the cash/check by USPS Priority/Priority Express mail is highly recommended.
 
Send me the tracking number as soon as you have sent the payment.
 
Carefully follow the instructions for secure and discreet packing (see below).
 
IF CASH:
 
Use the largest bills possible, do not include coins. (Trade for an even dollar amount.)
Lay the bills flat with paper folded over them, like a letter. (Do NOT fold the bills)
If mailing more than 9 bills, use a box or bubble mailer.
I recommend printing your mailing labels, but it is not required.
DO NOT use excessive tape or packing material.
 
You, as the mailer, are responsible for the security and swift arrival of your package, and these instructions are for your benefit.
 

STEP 2: RECEIVING PAYMENT:
I will record the opening of the package once I have received it. I will have the bills checked for counterfeit if cash, require the bank to verify your signature and call your number to verify you sent the payment if a check. If they are unable to cash it, I will burn the check on video. If everything is in order, I will let you know it arrived safely and move on to the next step.
 
STEP 3: RELEASING BITCOIN:
Once I have received the money, I will immediately release the Bitcoin to whatever wallet you request. You will receive my current, competitive rate, which I will confirm with you when I receive the payment.
 
Feel free to contact me before, during, or after the process if you have any questions or concerns. I’m happy to help!

You pay for postage and are responsible for the package until tracking shows it as delivered. It must be sent using the United States Postal Service (USPS) the same day as the trade request.

I accept any shipping speed, but the sooner your package arrives, the sooner you get bitcoin. The BTC amount shown when the trade is opened will be the same amount when the trade is finalized.

Layers will help disguise the contents of the package and keep them contained if the overpack is damaged. Cash should be the last guess as to what's inside. Take advantage of the free packing supplies at the Post Office. You can even have these supplies shipped to you for free from the USPS website.

I accept any denomination of US currency except coins. The higher denomination used, the lighter and less obvious your package will be.

PGP Key:
https://goo.gl/uPQwVR

By opening a trade with me you agree that:
- You are not a New York resident. No shipments will be accepted from New York.
- The cash was obtained legally
- The bitcoin will be used legally

Happy Trading,
- Andy :)

Send your cash Priority Express to the address provided.
amounts under $500 you may use priority 2day shipping
East Coast states Priority Express Only.
NV CA OR UT AZ ID CO Priority upto $1k ok.
MUST Include Tracking.
Failure to use Quick Shipping voids your choice to use Price Lock/Release Time Price.  And give me the option to choose the option advantageous to me.

Write a note to be included with your package or on the inner envelope.
"For Bitcoins on Localbitcoins.com Between SlowPoke and <Your user Name>"
or print out the trade once open.

You Will be shipping to
Las Vegas NV, 89113

I have a UPS store box
A store Employee will sign for it.
Then I go and pick it up
Package the cash securely and discretely to avoid loss or theft while it is in transit.
Pickup and release is usually around 3pm-6pm Pacific Time.

An envelope with some printer paper wrapped around the cash works.  then place that envelope into a Priority Express, or Bubble mailer envelope.

Please use Largest Bills possible
No more than 5 $10s 4 $5s NO $1s

 Use a box or bubble mailer when mailing more than ~10 bills
Print your shipping/address labels, if you can**
 Include a return address

DO NOT:
 Send more than 10 bills in a standard envelope
Fold the cash - this makes the letter too thick and easier to identify
Use excessive tape or packaging material
Use FedEx or UPS, only use the United States Postal Service
Include any coins
Use a birthday or holiday card
Send cash from outside of the United States


 Use a full-size envelope (#10 or 4.25"x9.5") or bubble mailer for First Class Mail; use a Flat Rate Envelope or Box for Priority or Priority Express Mail


Most printers can print directly on envelopes or you can print address or shipping labels. Hand-written is acceptable if you have no other options.

Send your package before the pickup cutoff, Post a tracking number.

When I receive your package, I will take a video as I open the package, count the cash, and check for counterfeit bills.

Under no circumstances will I be responsible for cash that is lost or stolen while in the mail. In case of dispute, the video of me opening the package/envelope will serve as proof of how much cash I received.

You may request price lock, or price at time of cash received, but you must decide at the start of the trade.

If price at time of cash received, you can open a second trade before canceling escrow on the first. This may take extra time if it's a larger trade since I would have to have enough coin for double escrow.

No NY

PLEASE IGNORE LBC DOLLAR VOLUME LIMITS AND CONTACT US DIRECTLY AT 949-346-4101 IF YOU WISH TO PURCHASE LARGER AMOUNTS.  We can open a larger trade via LBC.

SHIPPING COSTS:  *Paid by buyer.

*You may use any shipping method that has a tracking number and requires a signature.

ACCEPTED PAYMENTS:
1.   	Postal Money Order

Checks from all other banks CANNOT be accepted, unless previously discussed and agreed upon. Please specify method of payment before shipping to avoid any inconvenience or extra expense.

1) Open a Trade to see Payment Details. Must be able to complete trade within 2 hours.

2) Text your USERNAME to: (949) 346-4101 to receive the account information for the deposit.

3) Go to any Bank of America branch.  https://locators.bankofamerica.com/

4) Make a cash deposit to the name & account provided

5) Upload a picture of the deposit receipt. Write on Receipt: "No Refunds. For Bitcoin Purchase" and your User Name.

6) Get Bitcoin!

Online transfers only

No NY

Terms of Trade
1. Only initiate a trade if you are ready to complete a cash deposit within the hour.
2. Only cash payments from a Western Union Location accepted.
3. Once you have initiated the trade you will receive the transaction information.
4. All transaction fees are paid by the buyer.
5. Bitcoin shall be released only after payment instructions are completed.
6. Bitcoin is released in 50 minutes or less after receiving payment.
Important: We do not support criminal activity at any time. Suspicious activity will be reported to the proper authority. We may require a copy of your photo ID at any time for any reason.

Contact me here to receive western Union details to start trade
Please I don not receive online payment. All payment should be over the counter (bank or WU agent or shops)


1) I send you my info for transaction
2) You send me money in according with trade's amount. Also you have to pay all transaction's fees. 
3) Send me western union receipt's photo in chat.
4) I pick up transaction in one hour time depending on if it's working hours my local time. 
5) I send you Bitcoin with escrow enabled within the site

>>>> IMPORTANT REMINDERS <<<<
accept  moneygram and  Western Union  remittance

- We only accept transactions done in a Moneygram store, online MG takes too long and doesn't get approved most of the time.
- For the payment, currency to receive should be in USD!
- The buyer will have to pay all the transaction costs. 
- We will be asking for the following:
1. 1 valid proof of identification 
2. Selfie holding your valid ID.
3. Signed copy of WHOLE receipt with a note written on it- message will be provided later. (Please take note of this)
- WE DO NOT ACCEPT THIRD PARTY PAYMENTS. SENDER'S NAME SHOULD MATCH VERIFIED LOCALBITCOINS NAME.
- We start picking up once MG opens and we release BTC as soon as we have received the payment.


Looking forward to work with you! =)

Contact hours: 09:30 am -- 21:00 pm (GMT+8)
Contact hours: 01:30 am -- 15:00 pm (GMT)

my banks is open from 24:00 hours ereryday，accept  moneygram and  Western Union  remittance

For payments completed past 21:00 Viet beijing Time, verification will be made first thing in the morning the next day.
------------------------------------------
* Bitcoin released in 5 - 15 minutes after money arrived.
----------------------------------------------
* Paying by Western Union is fast, easy, and secure. 
---------------------------------------------
* Just follow the steps below and you'll get your coin quickly every time，Do not open a trade unless you are able to send within a hour.
-----------------------------------------------
1. Send a Trade Request for the desired amount.
----------------
2. Within ONE HOURS, visit any Western Union office and send the agreed amount to the recipient address below
--------------------
3. You will get a Western Union MTCN (tracking number)
a) Enter the MTCN on this page to track the payment https://www.westernunion.com/track-transfer?0
b) Only after the tracking page shows 'ARRIVED' , press Payment Complete and send us the MTCN
c) after send us the mtcn please take a quality picture of the receipt which I can clearly see:
- Sender's full name.
- City/country of origin.
- Tracking number (MTCN). 
----------------
4. Once we confirm the payment, we'll release coins to you instantly.

Be careful its a market and the price may change, if you will send money for a long time 
and the price will change, I can ask you to re-create the application at the current price
---------------------------------------------
